languages.text: "Фиксирую богохульство первой категории. Приговор — прижизненное анатомирование, изучение, позорная утилизация останков после прекращения жизненных функций".

"Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."
languages.original_text: "Фиксирую богохульство первой категории. Приговор — прижизненное анатомирование, изучение, позорная утилизация останков после прекращения жизненных функций".

traits.locale_text: "A first grade heresy recorded. The sentence — the intravital dissection and study,the shameful disposal of the remains after the cessation of vital functions."
"A first grade heresy recorded. The sentence — the intravital dissection and study,the shameful disposal of the remains after the cessation of vital functions."

"I hereby pronounce it to be first-degree blasphemy. The defendant is sentenced to the intravital dissection and study as well as to the shameful disposal of the remains after the cessation of vital functions."

"I hereby pronounce it to be first-degree blasphemy. The defendant is sentenced to the intravital dissection and study as well as to the shameful disposal of the remains after the cessation of vital functions."

"Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."

"Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."

languages.text: « Enregistrement d'un blasphème de catégorie un. L'unité Xavier Calcazar est condamnée à la dissection et à l'étude intravitales. Après son expiration, il conviendra de se débarrasser sommairement de sa dépouille. »
languages.original_text: "Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."

traits.locale_text: « Enregistrement d'un blasphème au premier degré. L'unité Xavier Calcazar est condamnée à la dissection et à l'étude intravitales. Après son expiration, il conviendra de se débarrasser sommairement de sa dépouille. »

languages.text: «Registrando una blasfemia de categoría uno. Por la presente, la unidad Xavier Calcazar queda sentenciada a disección y estudio intravital. Tras el cese de sus funciones vitales, los restos de la unidad se eliminarán de forma indecorosa».
languages.original_text: "Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."

traits.locale_text: «Por la presente, lo declaro blasfemia de primer grado. El acusado está condenado a disección intravital y estudio y a la eliminación indecorosa de sus restos tras el cese de sus funciones vitales».

languages.text: “检测到一级亵渎行为。我在此判处希维尔·卡尔卡扎需要进行活体解剖，作为研究之用。罪犯的生命机能停止后，遗体将以不体面的方式进行处理。”
languages.original_text: "Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."

traits.locale_text: “我在此宣布，这是一级亵渎行为。被告将被判处活体解剖，进行研究之用。当被告的生命机能停止后，被告的遗体将以不体面的方式进行处理。”

languages.text: "Ich registriere eine Blasphemie der Kategorie 1. Einheit Xavier Calcazar wird hiermit zur Dissektion mit anschließendem Studium verurteilt sowie zur unehrenhaften Entsorgung der Überreste nach Einstellung der Vitalfunktionen."
languages.original_text: "Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stufe das hiermit als Blasphemie ersten Grades ein. Der Angeklagte wird zur intravitalen Dissektion mit anschließendem Studium verurteilt sowie zur schändlichen Entsorgung der Überreste nach Einstellung der Vitalfunktionen."

languages.text: 「これは第一級の冒涜である。ユニット、ザビエル・カルカサルは、生体解剖および研究の対象とする。そして生命機能停止後、ユニットの遺体は、不名誉の中で放棄されることを宣告する」
languages.original_text: "Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."

traits.locale_text: 「これは第一級の冒涜である。ユニット、ザビエル・カルカサルは、生体解剖および研究の対象とする。そして生命機能停止後、ユニットの遺体は、不名誉の中で放棄されることを宣告する」

languages.text: "Birinci Kategori dine aykırılık kaydediliyor. Xavier Calcazar birimi, canlı parçalara ayırma ve inceleme cezasına mahkûm edilmiştir. Hayati faaliyetlerin sonlanmasının ardından birimden geriye kalan parçalar, utanç içinde yok edilmelidir."
languages.original_text: "Registering a Category One blasphemy. Unit Xavier Calcazar is hereby sentenced to intravital dissection and study. Upon the cessation of vital functions, the unit's remains must be disposed of in disgrace."
